sentences.sContent: plans to rejuvenate the inner city areas

synos.tran: 使年轻；使更新；使恢复精神；使复原

remMethod.val: re(再， 又) + juven(年轻的) + ate(使…) → 使年轻； 使恢复活力

words.tran: [地质][水文] 回春，返老还童；复壮，恢复活力
回春剂，返老还童药；使返老还童的人

trans.tranCn: 使年轻； 使恢复活力
trans.tranOther: to make something work much better or become much better again
